roleset.name: cause to be tame, accustomed to home life
roleset.note: DOMESTICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'domesticate' based on internet usage examples, expansion via verbnet. VN class 45.4. (from domesticate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Passive, no instrument
example.text: [The species]-1 was domesticated *-1 by the ancient Egyptians and has spread all over the world.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: the dog domesticated them with a wagging tail
